entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 33. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 34 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Light snow. High minus 24.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon then light snow. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h in the morning. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 47 in the morning and minus 36 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 03 March 2023
